程序包 com.se.aiconomy.server.service.impl

类 TransactionServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.se.aiconomy.server.service.impl.TransactionServiceImpl
所有已实现的接口:
TransactionService
public class TransactionServiceImpl extends Object implements TransactionService
Service implementation for handling transaction records and related business logic.

    • classifyTransactions

      public List<Map<Transaction,DynamicBillType>> classifyTransactions(List<TransactionDto> transactions)
      Classifies a list of TransactionDto objects using the TransactionClassificationService.
      指定者:
      classifyTransactions 在接口中 TransactionService
      参数:
      transactions - the list of TransactionDto to classify
      返回:
      a list of maps pairing Transaction and DynamicBillType

    • extractTransactionFromCSV

      public List<Map<Transaction,DynamicBillType>> extractTransactionFromCSV(String filePath) throws ServiceException
      Extracts and classifies transactions from a CSV file.
      指定者:
      extractTransactionFromCSV 在接口中 TransactionService
      参数:
      filePath - the path to the CSV file
      返回:
      a list of classified transactions
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if reading the file fails

    • getIncomeAndExpenseStatistics

      public Map<String,String> getIncomeAndExpenseStatistics(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      Gets income and expense statistics within a specified date range.
      参数:
      startTime - the start time
      endTime - the end time
      返回:
      a map containing totalIncome, totalExpense, and netAmount

    • getPaymentMethodStatistics

      Gets transaction statistics grouped by payment method.
      返回:
      a map of payment method to total amount

    • addTransactionManually

      public TransactionDto addTransactionManually(String userId, String incomeOrExpense, String amount, LocalDateTime time, String product, String type, String accountId, String remark) throws ServiceException
      Adds a transaction manually.
      指定者:
      addTransactionManually 在接口中 TransactionService
      参数:
      userId - the user ID
      incomeOrExpense - income or expense type
      amount - the transaction amount
      time - the transaction time
      product - the product
      type - the transaction type
      accountId - the account ID
      remark - remarks
      返回:
      the created TransactionDto
      抛出:
      ServiceException - if required fields are missing
